name: Cube War
description:
Cube War is an exhilarating 2D shooter set in the depths of space. Players take on the role of galactic nomads tasked with exploring and defending a galaxy teeming with enemies composed of various geometric shapes.

In Cube War, the adversaries come in the form of unique geometric shapes. Triangular warships, square tanks, and even round drones present players with a variety of strategic challenges.

Controls

Movement: W/A/S/D

You fire automatically.



By defeating the enemies, you will increase your level and fight more challenging and more enemies and try to reach the highest level.
